speaker: Donna Edwards
title: Creating a ‘best place to work’ culture
description: Being a leader in a ‘best place to work’ has many advantages. It’s easier to attract the best talent, employees are engaged and more productive, employees collaborate and actively contribute to making your company better and more successful.  \n\nBut where do you start? How do you create this type of environment? In this talk I will take you through some practical advice on how to create and implement strategies to turn your organisation into a ‘best place’.
